entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Varennes
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
